props.appendOuterIcon: Appends an icon to the outside the component's input, uses same syntax as `v-icon`
props.autoGrow: Auto-grows the input. This option requires the use of **v-model**
props.filled: Applies the alternate filled input style
props.clearIcon: Applied when using **clearable** and the input is dirty
props.counter: Creates counter for input length; if no number is specified, it defaults to 25. Does not apply any validation.
props.dark: Applies the dark theme variant to the component. This will default the components color to _white_ unless you've configured your [application theme](/customization/theme) to **dark** or if you are using the **color** prop on the component. You can find more information on the Material Design documentation for [dark themes](https://material.io/design/color/dark-theme.html).
props.flat: Removes elevation (shadow) added to element when using the **solo** or **solo-inverted** props
props.noResize: Removes the resize handle, only applies to **multi-line** and **textarea** props
props.outlined: Applies the outlined style to the input
props.prependInnerIcon: Prepends an icon inside the component's input, uses the same syntax as `v-icon`
props.rounded: Adds a border radius to the input
props.rows: Controls the number of rows in a textarea
props.rowHeight: Designate a custom _row-height_. Used for determining input height when using **multi-line** or **textarea** props
props.singleLine: Label does not move on focus/dirty
props.solo: Changes the style of the input
props.textarea: Textarea text field with alternate style
props.toggleKeys: Array of key codes that will toggle the input (if it supports toggling)
props.shaped: Round if `outlined` and increase `border-radius` if `filled`. Must be used with either `outlined` or `filled`

slots.append-outer: Adds an item outside the input and after input content
slots.prepend-inner: Adds an item inside the input and before input content

events.blur: Emitted when the input is blurred
events.change: Emitted when the input is changed by user interaction
events.click:append-outer: Emitted when appended outer icon is clicked
events.click:prepend-inner: Emitted when prepended inner icon is clicked
